name: Z-Fighter-X
description:
Z-Fighter-X

Created by Jeremy Elder

A quick and simple shoot'em made lazily over two weeks.

Story: Attacking aliens. Launch the Z-Fighter-X! Kill! Kill!

Game Info:

3 short stages. You have nine lives, no 1-ups. POW items give double shot then triple shot.

Controls:

Arrow Keys move. Z Key fires. R Key resets the game. ESC quits the game.

Game created with Game Maker Studio Pro. http://www.yoyogames.com/

Music created with Propellerhead's Figure. https://www.propellerheads.se/figure

SFX created with LabChirp. http://labbed.net/software.php?id=labchirp

Color Palette by Android. http://www.androidarts.com/

Fonts created by Somepx. https://twitter.com/somepx

More Info.

This was created as a simple experiment to test a few tile scrolling techniques.

Nothing too special.

Changelog:

1.1: Added gamepad support.

Added Mac OSX version.

1.0: Initial Release
